name: Antguy -ant route puzzler!!
description:
"Antguy wants cakes!"

Antguy is a doodle based physical puzzler.

Features

  • Easy control, Dynamic puzzles.
  • 5 worlds, 50 levels. w/ little animation parts :)
  • Some unique gadgets.
  • Unlockable extra items. (It doesn't need money of course.)
  • 16 in game achievements.
  • Peaceful mood & tracks.

Credits

  • Game By: camel504
  • Music By: Ruiko Murata
